headline.print_headline: Lhota’s Years in Private Industry Working for the Dolans
headline.main: Lhota’s Years Working for the Dolans

docs.abstract: Joseph J Lhota, Republican candidate for New York City mayor, is best known as one of former Mayor Rudolph W Giuliani’s most trusted lieutenants, but he actually spent greater part of his career working as a senior executive for Cablevision and Madison Square Garden (Series: In the Running).
docs.lead_paragraph: In his nearly 10 years with Cablevision and Madison Square Garden, owned by the Dolans, Joseph J. Lhota advocated generous benefits for his employer, which cost the city millions of dollars a year.
docs.snippet: In his nearly 10 years with Cablevision and Madison Square Garden, owned by the Dolans, Joseph J. Lhota advocated generous benefits for his employer, which cost the city millions of dollars a year.
